about.title: About This Site
about.intro: is a comprehensive portal dedicated to school calendars in metropolitan France and Overseas territories. Our mission is to provide families, teachers, professionals, and anyone interested with simple, fast, and reliable access to official school holiday dates.
about.updateInfo: The information is regularly updated based on official data published by the Ministry of National Education. The site organizes dates by academic zones (A, B, and C) and covers all school holiday periods:
about.regionsInfo: We also include specific calendars for Corsica and Overseas regions (Guadeloupe, Guyana, Martinique, Mayotte, Réunion), so everyone can find the information that fits their location.
about.whyIntro: We started with a simple observation: finding all school holiday dates for each zone and period quickly was not always easy. With dates-vacances.education, you can view all the necessary information at a glance to:

whyList.planning: Prepare for childcare or leisure time

about.offerIntro: Our goal is to make your experience clear and intuitive. Here are some useful tools available on our site:

tools.counters: Holiday counters: View the countdown to each vacation period in real time.
tools.search: Personalized search: Quickly find an academy or region to view its dates.
tools.tables: Summary tables: Easily compare vacation periods between different zones.

about.commitmentText: We are committed to providing you with reliable and up-to-date service while continuously improving the site to make it even more complete and practical. dates-vacances.education is here to help you organize the school year with ease!
